Class StructuralAnalysis

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.engineering.structural.StructuralAnalysis
public class StructuralAnalysis extends Object
Structural analysis calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Details

    • simpleBeamDeflectionUniform

      public static double simpleBeamDeflectionUniform(double w, double L, double E, double I)
      Simply supported beam: maximum deflection at center. δ_max = (5 * w * L⁴) / (384 * E * I)
      Parameters:
      w - Distributed load (N/m)
      L - Beam length (m)
      E - Young's modulus (Pa)
      I - Second moment of area (m⁴)
      Returns:
      Maximum deflection (m)

    • simpleBeamDeflectionPoint

      public static double simpleBeamDeflectionPoint(double P, double L, double E, double I)
      Simply supported beam: deflection under point load at center. δ_max = (P * L³) / (48 * E * I)

    • cantileverDeflectionUniform

      public static double cantileverDeflectionUniform(double w, double L, double E, double I)
      Cantilever beam: deflection at free end under uniform load. δ_max = (w * L⁴) / (8 * E * I)

    • cantileverDeflectionPoint

      public static double cantileverDeflectionPoint(double P, double L, double E, double I)
      Cantilever beam: deflection at free end under point load. δ_max = (P * L³) / (3 * E * I)

    • simpleBeamMomentUniform

      public static double simpleBeamMomentUniform(double w, double L)
      Maximum bending moment for simply supported beam with uniform load. M_max = w * L² / 8

    • cantileverMomentUniform

      public static double cantileverMomentUniform(double w, double L)
      Maximum bending moment for cantilever with uniform load. M_max = w * L² / 2

    • bendingStress

      public static double bendingStress(double moment, double distanceFromNA, double momentOfInertia)
      Bending stress. σ = M * y / I

    • shearStress

      public static double shearStress(double shearForce, double firstMoment, double momentOfInertia, double width)
      Shear stress in beam. τ = V * Q / (I * b)

    • rectangleMomentOfInertia

      public static double rectangleMomentOfInertia(double width, double height)
      Second moment of area for rectangle. I = b * h³ / 12

    • circleMomentOfInertia

      public static double circleMomentOfInertia(double radius)
      Second moment of area for circle. I = π * r⁴ / 4

    • sectionModulus

      public static double sectionModulus(double momentOfInertia, double distanceToExtreme)
      Section modulus. S = I / y_max

    • eulerBucklingLoad

      public static double eulerBucklingLoad(double E, double I, double L, double K)
      Column buckling (Euler formula). P_cr = π² * E * I / (K * L)²
      Parameters:
      E - Young's modulus (Pa)
      I - Moment of inertia (m⁴)
      L - Column length (m)
      K - Effective length factor (1.0 for pinned-pinned)

    • slendernessRatio

      public static double slendernessRatio(double K, double L, double radiusOfGyration)
      Slenderness ratio. λ = K * L / r where r = √(I/A) is radius of gyration

    • radiusOfGyration

      public static double radiusOfGyration(double momentOfInertia, double area)
      Radius of gyration. r = √(I / A)

    • trussMemberForce

      public static double trussMemberForce(double angle, double jointForce)
      Truss member force (method of joints - simplified). For equilibrium: ΣFx = 0, ΣFy = 0

    • torsionalShearStress

      public static double torsionalShearStress(double torque, double radius)
      Torsional shear stress in circular shaft. τ = T * r / J where J = πr⁴/2

    • angleOfTwist

      public static double angleOfTwist(double torque, double length, double shearModulus, double radius)
      Angle of twist. θ = T * L / (G * J)

    • bendingStress

      public static Quantity<Pressure> bendingStress(Quantity<?> moment, Quantity<Length> distanceFromNA, double momentOfInertia)
      Bending stress using Quantity types. σ = M * y / I
      Parameters:
      moment - Bending moment
      distanceFromNA - Distance from neutral axis
      momentOfInertia - Second moment of area
      Returns:
      Stress as Quantity

    • eulerBucklingLoad

      public static Quantity<Force> eulerBucklingLoad(Quantity<Pressure> E, double I, Quantity<Length> L, double K)
      Euler buckling load using Quantity types.
      Parameters:
      E - Young's modulus
      I - Moment of inertia (m^4)
      L - Column length
      K - Effective length factor
      Returns:
      Critical buckling load as Force
